name: Block Puzzly
description:
Block Puzzly is not just that. It is more Simple and addictive! Once you start, you will not stop playing. Just have a try, you will love it!
Easy to play and pleasurable game for all age.
Easy to learn and fun to master gameplay.

FEATURES OF THE BLOCK PUZZLY
* No time limits
* No wifi needed
* Completely free
* Fun and new Block Combo Mode
* Cool blocks and block animations
* More Game Modes and easy to learn
* With Beginner's guide and suitable for all age


HOW TO PLAY BLOCK PUZZLY
* The blocks can not be rotated
* Drag the block to fill block grid with full row or column
* Accumulation of energy will shake the blocks
* Complete levels with different levels of difficulty and challenge higher levels.
* Exciting game mode，The Bomb will blast when bomb block becomes zero
* Casual game mode, no time limits and you can replay it at anytime and anywhere

NOTES
• Block puzzly supports mobile phones & tablet PCs.
• Block puzzly contains ads varying from banners, interstitials, videos to house ads.
• Block puzzly is free to play, however, you may purchase Ad Free.

You can play anytime and anywhere! We really hope you enjoy it!
Quickly , let's try the game.
